body: The `test_factory_default` test case without `USE_ZERO_SIZE_DIM` still expects the size to be `torch.Size([])`, so we should probably enable the new behavior only when `USE_ZERO_SIZE_DIM` is enabled.
body_html: The test_factory_default test case without USE_ZERO_SIZE_DIM still expects the size to be torch.Size([]), so we should probably enable the new behavior only when USE_ZERO_SIZE_DIM is enabled.
